sentences.sContent: ...the immense variety of fonts available in Microsoft Word and Publisher.
sentences.sCn: …微软的文字处理软件和排版软件中提供的种类繁多的字体。

synos.tran: 字体；字形；泉；洗礼盘，圣水器

trans.tranCn: 字体；字形；泉；洗礼盘，圣水器
trans.tranOther: a set of letters of a particular size and style, used for printing books, newspapers etc or on a computer screen
